events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering team, specifically for a senior developer role.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to case manage your application.
We completed the initial screening call and were impressed with your experience in software development.
Thank you for your prompt response and enthusiasm about the opportunity to join our engineering team.
Your technical interview with our lead developer has been scheduled for May 7th at 10am UTC.
You completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong coding skills and problem-solving ability.
The HR interview has been arranged for May 10th to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went well, and the candidate expressed strong interest in joining our engineering team.
An offer has been extended to the candidate including competitive salary and comprehensive benefits package.
We received positive feedback from the candidate expressing excitement about joining our engineering department.
The candidate has accepted the offer and is eager to start contributing as a software developer.
The onboarding process has begun, providing access to necessary tools and introducing the candidate to the engineering team.
The hiring process is officially closed with a successful placement of the candidate in the software engineering role.
